entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Makkovik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:34 AM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 46 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28 except minus 32 in the Postville area.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28 except minus 32 in the Postville area. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Thursday 02 February 2023
